stateDiagram

state NORMAL {

        OFF

        OFF : OFF

        OFF : en / #123; set_color("#CCC")#59; #125;

        BLUE

        BLUE : BLUE

        BLUE : en / #123; set_color("#a2f2ff")#59; #125;

        YELLOW

        YELLOW : YELLOW

        YELLOW : en / #123; set_color("#fdff71")#59; #125;

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as NORMAL.(InitialState)

}

RED

RED : RED

RED : en / #123; set_color("#ff4f4f")#59; #125;

RED : INPUT / #123; beep()#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

NORMAL --> RED : ERR

OFF --> BLUE : INC1

OFF --> YELLOW : INC2

BLUE --> OFF : DIMx

BLUE --> YELLOW : INCx

YELLOW --> BLUE : DIM1

YELLOW --> OFF : DIM2

NORMAL.(InitialState) --> OFF

RED --> NORMAL : INCITE_RESET

ROOT.(InitialState) --> NORMAL
Events
settings delete help
